# Load map sources
## Shape files and data

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, results="hide", class.source = 'fold-hide'}

# MAP SOURCES

ssd_admbnda_adm0 <- st_read("archetypes/countries/south-sudan/ssd_admbnda_adm0_imwg_nbs_20180817/ssd_admbnda_adm0_imwg_nbs_20180817.shp")
ssd_admbnda_adm1 <- st_read("archetypes/countries/south-sudan/ssd_admbnda_adm1_imwg_nbs_20180817/ssd_admbnda_adm1_imwg_nbs_20180817.shp")
ssd_admbnda_adm2 <- st_read("archetypes/countries/south-sudan/ssd_admbnda_adm2_imwg_nbs_20180817/ssd_admbnda_adm2_imwg_nbs_20180817.shp")

ssd_roads <- st_read("archetypes/countries/south-sudan/final_southern_sudan_roads_version01/Final_Southern_Sudan_Roads_Version01.shp")

```


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

# DATA SOURCES
df = read.csv("archetypes/countries/south-sudan/ssd-cities.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df

```


# Plot by layer
## adm0, adm1, adm2, roads, and cities


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide', fig.width=12, fig.height=6, out.width = "100%"}

# theme parameters
theme_opts <- theme(
  legend.position = "none",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  axis.text = element_blank(),
  axis.line = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  axis.title = element_blank(),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.background = element_blank(),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  plot.background = element_blank(),
)

transparent_fill <- rgb(0, 0, 0, max = 255, alpha = 0, names = "transparent")

# In order of layer placement top -> down
v1 = ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = ssd_admbnda_adm0, color="#333333", fill = transparent_fill, size=2.0) +
  geom_sf(data = ssd_admbnda_adm1, color="#555555", fill = transparent_fill, size=1.0) +
  geom_sf(data = ssd_admbnda_adm2, color="#888888", fill = transparent_fill, size=0.5) +
  geom_sf(data = ssd_roads, color="red", fill = "red", size=0.3) +
  geom_point( data = df, aes(x=lng, y=lat, size=population), color = "red", alpha=0.8) +
  scale_x_continuous() +
  scale_y_continuous() +
  coord_sf() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x="", # Longitude
       y="", # Latitude
       title = "Shape File Vector Map", 
       subtitle="Admin Layers, Roads, and Settlements") +
  theme_opts

# v1

girafe( ggobj = v1, width_svg = 12, height_svg = 6,
  options = list( opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE) )
)

```


## Save output to file


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

ggsave(filename = "assets/south-sudan-shp.svg", plot = v1, width=12, height=6)

```
